title: Slay Belles
description: 'PIGS IN BLANKETS' WILL NEVER BE THE SAME AGAIN!! Jimmy is a bad husband. In a last ditch attempt to save their troubled marriage his wife, Angela, books them a romantic Christmas break at a remote inn. When her elderly mother is suddenly taken ill, Angela has to dash off, leaving her husband alone at the inn on Christmas Eve with only the beautiful, sexy twins who run the place to keep him company. Jimmy thinks he’s in for an evening of fun and games – and he is! But the games these sick, twisted sisters like to play will ensure that this will most definitely not be a Silent Night! THIS IS AN EXTREME HORROR SHORT STORY AND CONTAINS SCENES THAT MAY DISTURB
author: Anton Palmer
